alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:59AM CST until March 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog and freezing drizzle are expected before the snow begins. A light glaze of ice accumulation is possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
